overview: Lifelong friends find themselves on opposite sides of the law in this gritty urban action. Mike (Grady McCardell-Walker Texas Ranger) and his close friends Kareem (Jason Morgan), Preacha (Shawn McClemore) and BJ (Curtis Von Burrell -Jason's Lyric) were born and raised on the same mean streets of an unforgiving inner-city neighborhood. Marvin (Thomas Miles II -Thug Life), Mike's brother, was a major player in a drug cartel who was killed by rivals in an attempt to takeover the cartel. BJ, now a detective assigned to take down the cartel, finds himself going head to head with his lifelong friends who are out for violent revenge. So, where do his loyalties as a friend end, and his duties as a police officer begin?
title: Death Of A G
